name: Notre-Dame
description:
Notre-Dame is my first game. I made it individually on Unity with the basics I learned during my first year at the Institute of Internet and Multimedia.

Pitch : 

You embody NYX, a gargoyle which is a Lord Dracula’s servant. Your objective is to kill every gardians of the Notre-Dame’s council to let Lord Dracula rule the world ! You’ll need to reach the Boss room by overcoming obstacles and taking loots. 

Thank you for your support (even if this prototype is not perfect) !
